text: went to collect parcel and the chinese lady who gave me them was so rude. cannot talk nicely. i have a few more parcels coming soon and if she shows me attitude one more time i will complain once again. learn how to show manners la please especially to your customers.

I don't write reviews usually, even lesser on minimarts, but I really feel I should write something about this store. Staff are really nice and approachable and were very patient in helping out. It is truly a neighborhood shop.
